historical_summary: Xavier has navigated the tumultuous waters of college life, focusing on computer science and finance, with a particular interest in blockchain and trading. He experienced the pressures of coding assignments and the allure of quant finance, leading to an internship at a quant firm through a family connection.
He began exploring the crypto market, particularly intrigued by Bitcoin and Ethereum, and started to engage with market trends and trading simulations.
upcoming: Quant Trading: Xavier will start his job at the quant firm, focusing on developing and refining trading algorithms using AI Pair Programming to enhance his productivity and accuracy in coding trading strategies.
Side Projects: He plans to initiate a personal project exploring the integration of blockchain with gaming, leveraging Smart Contracts to ensure fair play and secure transactions within the games.
Certifications: Xavier will pursue certifications in blockchain technology to solidify his expertise, preparing for potential career advancement or entrepreneurial ventures.

historical_summary: Xavier has transitioned from feeling out of place in college to finding his footing through social interactions and dating. His interest in exploring the city has led to unique experiences like spontaneous karaoke on the subway and late-night adventures.
His personal life has been a mix of existential crises, networking, and balancing academic life with personal interests.
upcoming: Dating: Xavier will continue to explore dating, aiming to build deeper connections rather than casual encounters, using his newfound confidence from professional achievements.
Hobby Exploration: He will delve into more structured hobbies, possibly picking up sketching or another creative outlet inspired by his travels, which could also benefit his professional creativity.
Travel: Following his spontaneous trip to Bangkok, Xavier might plan another short getaway, perhaps to Tokyo, to further broaden his horizons and inspire personal growth.

historical_summary: Xavier has maintained regular communication with his family, sharing stories from his tech explorations and college life, which has often been a source of support and guidance.
upcoming: Family Visits: With his new job and financial independence, Xavier will plan to visit his family, sharing his professional achievements and seeking their advice on his career trajectory.
Family Involvement: He might involve his family in his crypto ventures, discussing potential investments or seeking their input on his trading strategies.

historical_summary: Xavier's social life has evolved from awkward dorm interactions to forming meaningful connections through shared interests in technology, finance, and gaming. He's also engaged in networking for professional growth.
upcoming: Crypto Meetups: Xavier will attend or organize crypto meetups to expand his network within the blockchain community, possibly using platforms like Crypto Twitter for outreach.
Professional Networking: He will leverage his new job to connect with industry leaders, attending quant finance conferences or seminars to build a robust professional network.
Social Events: He plans to balance work with play, attending social gatherings where he can both relax and network, potentially hosting a small gathering at his place to showcase his projects.

historical_summary: Xavier has often reflected on his life choices, from questioning the value of college education to contemplating the nature of reality and his role in it, influenced by his tech explorations and personal experiences.
upcoming: Tech Maturity: He will reflect on how technologies like AI Pair Programming are transforming the development landscape, considering how these tools might evolve and their implications for his career.

Future of Blockchain: Xavier will delve into the potential of blockchain technology beyond finance, exploring its application in governance, supply chain, and identity verification, possibly writing articles or blogs on these topics.

Personal Growth: He will continue to ponder his personal development, using his experiences with trading, travel, and relationships to understand what truly motivates him and where he sees his life heading in the next phase.
